content: From http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201701_Patient_Track_Proposal#Help_Links there is a link to http://gforge.hl7.org/svn/fhir/trunk/connectathons/SanAntonioJan2017/Connectathon14/Patient-01-Intro/ but this link only brings up a blank page whether using the anonymous/{email} user or an actual gforge.hl7.org account... Does anyone know why you can no longer browse the svn repository via the web interface?

By viewing the source of what is returned, Ewout discovered that the /svnindex.xsl appears to be missing from http://gforge.hl7.org -- which may explain why you cannot currently browse the svn repository via the web interface. Ewout has sent a note to the HL7 staff to see if they can find out if that file can be made available again.
